content.text:
# Miss International Queen Nicaragua

| membership_year = 2012

| leader_title = Miss International Queen Nicaragua 2025

| key_people = * Tiffany's Show Pattaya

Miss International Queen Nicaragua is national beauty pageant for transgender woman in Nicaragua since 2012 Nicaragua has competed in the international pageant Miss International Queen in Thailand. Nonetheless, Nicaragua has only competed in 6 editions of the pageant.
The reining Miss International Queen Nicaragua 2025 is Tiffany Colleman from Managua. She placed in the top 12 in the Miss International Queen 2025 becoming the first Nicaraguan to qualify in the pageant.
History
